overview_summary: All five profiled neighbors have no documented stance for or against the development, leaving their positions unknown. None hold formal public office or notable leadership roles, and community influence appears limited – only one household (a local contractor–realtor couple) shows moderate influence through business connections.

neighbors.name: Rodrick B. Sauls
neighbors.claims: Rodrick B. Sauls has no evident public roles or media presence in Anderson County ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,sauls)). No meeting minutes or local news source reviewed mentions a person by this name in community affairs ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,sauls)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage one-on-one through a respectful personal visit. Emphasize listening to any concerns and demonstrate respect for his property rights and privacy.

neighbors.name: Michael S. Gossett & Kelli S. Whitman
neighbors.claims: Kelli S. Whitman uses a mailing address in Starr, South Carolina ([www.idcrawl.com](https://www.idcrawl.com/kelli-whitman#:~:text=Kelli%20S%20Whitman)). Public records indicate Whitman previously had an address in Orlando, Florida before relocating to Anderson County ([www.idcrawl.com](https://www.idcrawl.com/kelli-whitman#:~:text=)). No records of civic positions or local advocacy by Michael Gossett or Kelli Whitman were found in Anderson County sources ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,sauls)).
neighbors.influence_justification: New to area; no known roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Welcome this couple as relatively new community members. A neighborly introduction highlighting respect for the rural character they sought by moving here may build trust.

neighbors.name: Donald B. Wilson & Sue G. Wilson
neighbors.claims: Donald B. Wilson and Sue G. Wilson are listed as co-owners of a parcel in Anderson County (PIN 225-06-04-002) ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,donald)). There is no mention of either Donald or Sue Wilson in available Anderson County civic records or news archives, suggesting they are private residents without public-facing roles ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,donald)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via a mutual acquaintance or community leader who knows them. Emphasize respect for their property and address any local concerns (traffic, noise) they might have quietly and directly.

neighbors.name: Lynn B. Hill
neighbors.claims: Lynn B. Hill appears to have no public profile in Anderson County’s records ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,hill)). A search of county minutes and local news yielded no references to Lynn Hill, indicating no known civic positions or outspoken community activities ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,hill)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Connect through a friendly, informal visit. Given the lack of public involvement, listen for any personal concerns and offer to follow up on issues like property maintenance or safety that might matter to this neighbor.

neighbors.name: Eric Schaefer & Christine Demetriou
neighbors.claims: Christine Demetriou works as the Office Manager at E.W. Schaefer Contracting, Inc. (since 2009) and is also a real estate agent ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/christine-demetriou%27s-email/137350655#:~:text=Office%20Manager%20at%20E,Contracting%2C%20Inc)). Her professional base is in Woodruff, SC ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/christine-demetriou%27s-email/137350655#:~:text=Location%3A)), though she co-owns property in Anderson County with Eric Schaefer. No public statements from this couple about local development or energy projects were found in local records ([www.andersoncountysc.org](https://www.andersoncountysc.org/county-council/#:~:text=No%20,sauls)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through a professional lens – for example, have a local business or trade ally introduce the project. Emphasize economic benefits and any local contracting opportunities or property value protections to align with their business interests.
